DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research study investigate well Habit Reversal Training ( HRT ) work reduce hair-pulling symptom child adolescent trichotillomania ( TTM ) . All child option receive 8 weekly HRT session . Half child choose random receive session immediately follow pre-assessment remain half receive eight week ( TAU condition ) . These session focus develop skill manage TTM decrease hair pull . Such skill may include teach child replace hair-pulling another behavior . In TAU condition , participant seek treatment community , option receive HRT treatment session end study . Participants group undergo four assessment total ( 1 ) Pre-Assessment ; ( 2 ) Post-treatment Assessment ; ( 3 ) One-month Follow-up ; ( 4 ) Three-month Follow-up . These assessment involve several interview ask different psychological symptom child experience sadness , anxiety , TTM .
